data.comment: Today's referee, Andy Woolmer, has blown to start the match.
Rotherham take a 1-0 lead thanks to Ben Wiles.
In the minute 45, Andy Woolmer blows to end the first-half.
Andy Woolmer has blown to start the second-half.
The home team have replaced George Hirst with Michael Smith. This is the first substitution made today by Paul Warne.
In the minute 70, Paul Warne is making the team's second substitution at AESSEAL New York Stadium with Kyle Vassell replacing Freddie Ladapo.
Jamie Lindsay is replacing Shaun MacDonald for the home team.
Matty Daly is replacing Juninho Bacuna for Huddersfield at AESSEAL New York Stadium.
In the minute 79, At AESSEAL New York Stadium, Joe Mattock has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Huddersfield make their second substitution with Adama Diakhaby replacing Isaac Mbenza.
Richard Stearman (Huddersfield) has received a yellow card from Andy Woolmer.
Andy Woolmer blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
An unfortunate own goal by Angus MacDonald makes the score 1-1.
